module: Week 3 Day 13 Hour 5-6 Cross-Reference and Link Management

ast_test_sample.solution: Changed single-quoted here-string to double-quoted with escaped variables

documentation_quality_assessment.issue: Here-string parsing errors causing module load failure
documentation_quality_assessment.solution: Fixed here-string format using single quotes for literal content

get_relative_path.solution: Added try/catch with string manipulation fallback in 2 locations

content_embedding_parameter.solution: Changed to 'Synopsis' which is in the ValidateSet

performance_improvements.ast_analysis: Now properly parses test files without errors
performance_improvements.quality_assessment: Module loads successfully without syntax errors
performance_improvements.content_suggestions: AI integration working with correct parameters

critical_learnings.learning: PowerShell here-strings require careful quote handling
critical_learnings.impact: Use single quotes for literal content, double quotes with escaping for variable expansion
Always provide PowerShell 5.1 fallback for compatibility
Always verify allowed values before calling functions with ValidateSet

next_action.description: Run complete modular test suite without skips

recommendation: RECOMMENDATION: TEST - ./Run-ModularTest-Complete.ps1: Execute complete modular test suite to validate all fixes and confirm 100% success rate with full functionality
